languages.text: Благодаря влиянию Лорд-капитана Идира и Вигдис вновь сблизились, залатав разошедшуюся по швам дружбу. Их часто можно было увидеть болтающими за столом для азартных игр с бокалами амасека. На бледных щеках Мастера вокса после таких встреч проступал румянец — явление редкое и неуловимое подобно пустотному кракену. Предаваясь веселью, подруги старались не думать о том, сколько времени отпущено каждой из них.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идиры пси-удушитель не надет добровольно

languages.text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.
languages.original_text: Благодаря влиянию Лорд-капитана Идира и Вигдис вновь сблизились, залатав разошедшуюся по швам дружбу. Их часто можно было увидеть болтающими за столом для азартных игр с бокалами амасека. На бледных щеках Мастера вокса после таких встреч проступал румянец — явление редкое и неуловимое подобно пустотному кракену. Предаваясь веселью, подруги старались не думать о том, сколько времени отпущено каждой из них.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis became close again, mending their torn friendship. They were often seen talking at the gambling table with glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of Vox Master after such events brightened with colour, which was a rare sight — you would sooner catch a void kraken than see Toliman in such a state. Filling their souls with merriment, good friends tried not to consider how long each of them had left.

Thanks to the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis became close again, mending their torn friendship. They were often seen talking at the gambling table with glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of Vox Master after such events brightened with colour, which was a rare sight — you would sooner catch a void kraken than see Toliman in such a state. Filling their souls with merriment, good friends tried not to consider how long each of them had left.

Thanks to the influence of the Lord Captain, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the gambling table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those happy moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long each of them had left.

The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those happy moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long each of them had left.

Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

languages.text: 在领主舰长的影响下，伊迪拉和维格迪斯再次走到了一起，恢复了她们破裂的友谊。人们经常看到她们在牌桌上一边喝着阿玛塞克酒，一边聊天。而在这之后，音阵大师苍白的脸颊总是会容光焕发，这样的景象就像虚空海怪一样罕见。这对好朋友享受着珍贵的每一刻，尽量不去想她们各自还能活多长时间。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: 在领主舰长的影响下，伊迪拉和维格迪斯再次走到了一起，恢复了她们破裂的友谊。人们经常看到她们在赌桌上一边喝着阿玛塞克酒，一边聊天。而在这之后，音阵大师苍白的脸颊总是会容光焕发，这样的景象就像虚空海怪一样罕见。这对好朋友享受着快乐的时刻，尽量不去想她们各自还能活多长时间。

languages.text: Durch den Einfluss des Lord Captains näherten sich Idira und Vigdis aneinander wieder an und kitteten ihre zerstörte Freundschaft. Man konnte sie oft bei einem Glas Amasec am Kartentisch sitzen sehen. Die fahlen Wengen der Voxmeisterin nahmen nach solchen Begegnungen immer ein wenig Farbe an — ein ebenso seltener Anblick wie ein Leerenkrake. Die guten Freundinnen genossen diese wertvollen Augenblicke und versuchten, nicht darüber nachzudenken, wie viel Zeit ihnen jeweils noch blieb.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: Durch den Einfluss des Lord Captains näherten sich Idira und Vigdis aneinander wieder an und kitteten ihre zerstörte Freundschaft. Man konnte sie oft bei einem Glas Amasec am Spieltisch sitzen sehen. Die fahlen Wengen der Voxmeisterin nahmen nach solchen Begegnungen immer ein wenig Farbe an — ein ebenso seltener Anblick wie ein Leerenkrake. Die guten Freundinnen genossen diese glücklichen Augenblicke und versuchten, nicht darüber nachzudenken, wie viel Zeit ihnen jeweils noch blieb.

languages.text: Grâce à l'influence {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Idira et Vigdis réussirent à se réconcilier. On les voyait souvent ensemble à la table de jeu, cartes et verres d'amasec à la main. Les joues pâles de la maîtresse-vox reprenaient alors des couleurs, un événement aussi rare qu'une rencontre avec un kraken du vide. Les deux amies essayaient de profiter de ces précieux moments sans se préoccuper du temps qu'il leur restait à vivre.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à l'influence {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, Idira et Vigdis réussirent à se réconcilier. On les voyait souvent ensemble à la table de jeu, leurs verres d'amasec à la main. Les joues pâles de la maîtresse-vox reprenaient alors des couleurs, un événement aussi rare qu'une rencontre avec un kraken du vide. Les deux amies essayaient de profiter de ces moments de bonheur sans se préoccuper du temps qu'il leur restait à vivre.

languages.text: Gracias a la influencia de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Idira y Vigdis volvieron a llevarse bien y repararon su amistad dañada. Era habitual verlas hablando en la mesa de cartas con copas de amasec. Las mejillas pálidas de la maestra de vocos se llenaban de color después de esos encuentros; algo tan inusual como avistar un kraken del vacío. Las amigas disfrutaban de esos preciados momentos, intentando no pensar en cuánto tiempo les quedaba.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a la influencia de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Idira y Vigdis volvieron a llevarse bien y repararon su amistad dañada. Era habitual verlas hablando en la mesa de juegos con copas de amasec. Las mejillas pálidas de la maestra de vocos se llenaban de color después de esos encuentros; algo tan inusual como avistar un kraken del vacío. Las amigas disfrutaban de esos momentos felices, intentando no pensar en cuánto tiempo les quedaba.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの影響を受け、イディラとヴィグディスは再び親密になり、断絶していた友情を修復した。二人は、しばしばギャンブルの席でアマセックのグラスを傾けながら話していた。ヴォクス・マスターの青白い頬は、そのような機会が訪れた後は明るく色づいていた。それはヴォイド・クラーケンを発見するかのような珍しい光景だった。そんな貴重なひとときを楽しみながら、仲の良い友人たちは、それぞれに残されている時間の長さを考えないようにしていた。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの影響を受け、イディラとヴィグディスは再び親密になり、断絶していた友情を修復した。二人は、しばしばギャンブルの席でアマセックのグラスを傾けながら話していた。ヴォクス・マスターの青白い頬は、そのような機会が訪れた後は明るく色づいていた。それはヴォイド・クラーケンを発見するかのような珍しい光景だった。そんな貴重なひとときを楽しみながら、仲の良い友人たちは、それぞれに残されている時間の長さを考えないようにしていた。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın etkisiyle İdira ve Vigdis, yeniden yakınlaşarak bozulmuş arkadaşlıklarını onardı. Sıklıkla birer bardak amasek eşliğinde kart masasında oturup konuşurken görüldüler. Voks Üstadı'nın solgun yanaklarına bu konuşmalardan sonra hep renk gelirdi. Kaldı ki bu durum, bir uçsuz krakeni kadar nadir görülürdü. İyi dostlar, bu değerli anların tadını çıkarırken kimin ne kadar ömrü kaldığı konusunu açmamaya çalıştı.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Lord Captain's influence, Idira and Vigdis became close once again, mending their sundered friendship. They were often seen talking at the card table over glasses of amasec. The pale cheeks of the Vox Master would brighten with colour after such encounters — a sight as rare as a void kraken. Enjoying those precious moments, the good friends tried not to dwell on how long either of them had left.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın etkisiyle İdira ve Vigdis yeniden yakınlaştılar ve bozulmuş arkadaşlıklarını onardılar. Sıklıkla birer bardak amasek eşliğinde kart masasında oturup konuşurlarken görüldüler. Voks Üstadı'nın solgun yanaklarına bu konuşmalardan sonra hep renk gelirdi, ki bu, bir uçsuz krakeni kadar nadir bir manzaradır. İyi dostlar bu değerli anların tadını çıkarırlarken, kimin ne kadar uzun süre gittiği konusuna değinmemeye çalıştılar.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идиры пси-удушитель не надет добровольно
